title: EventBridge - Lambda - Comprehend
description: Automate the deployment and deletion of endpoints for hosting Comprehend custom models using EventBridge Scheduler, Lambda, DynamoDB, and Comprehend

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This patterns shows CDK deployment on how to leverage Amazon EventBridge, AWS Lambda, Amazon DynamoDB, and Amazon Comprehend to automate the creation & deletion of an endpoint in Amazon Comprehend, to host custom-trained models for document classification or entity recognition.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Arjun Arippa
authors.bio: Arjun Arippa is a Solutions Architect based in Bangalore, India. He works with some of the strategic and global customers in India, to build and architect their applications on AWS.
